intro.title: Answers & Logistics
intro.description: Practical details for ordering, caring, and receiving Nirakara pieces.

questions.q: How long do made-to-order pieces take?
questions.a: Sterling silver pieces require 10-14 days. Gold vermeil may add 5 days for electroplating. You will receive a status email at casting, finishing, and shipping.
Yes. We ship worldwide via DHL Express every Wednesday. Duties are calculated at checkout using HS code 7113 for silver jewelry.
One complimentary resize is available within 60 days of delivery for sterling silver bands between sizes 5-10.

questions.q: How should I care for my pieces?
questions.a: Keep jewelry dry, store separately in the recycled rubber pouch provided, and polish with the included treated cloth. Avoid ultrasonic cleaners for oxidized finishes.
